title: send_file doesn't urlencode ':/' in unicode attachment_filename
raw_output: Issue 3074 reports that send_file doesn't properly URL-encode special characters like ':/' in unicode attachment filenames. The fix is in the send_file function in helpers.py. Predicted files: (1) flask/helpers.py - contains send_file() with attachment filename handling. (2) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry for the bug fix. (3) tests/test_helpers.py - helpers tests covering send_file behavior. Exploration: Matched flask/helpers.py -> tests/test_helpers.py.
